tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE Ecotourism_Feedback (
  feedback_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  ecotourist_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  rating INT CHECK (rating >= 1 AND rating <= 5),
  review TEXT,
  date_submitted TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE feedback (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  ecotourist_id INT,
  initiative_id INT,
  rating INT,
  comment TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE initiatives (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR(255),
  location VARCHAR(255),
  start_date DATE,
  end_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE feedback (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    tourist_name VARCHAR(50),
    feedback_text TEXT,
    rating INT,
    visit_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE review (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    review_text TEXT,
    reviewer_name VARCHAR(50),
    rating INT,
    review_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE initiative (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    initiative_name VARCHAR(50),
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE,
    success_rate FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE feedback (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    ecotourist_id INT,
    date DATE,
    rating INT,
    comment TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE initiative_feedback (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    initiative_id INT,
    feedback_id INT,
    rating INT,
    comment TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE ecotourism_initiatives (
  initiative_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  initiative_name VARCHAR(100),
  location VARCHAR(50),
  start_date DATE,
  end_date DATE
);
